tidbits.title: Rich History and Culture
tidbits.description: Mexico boasts a rich history, from ancient civilizations like the Aztecs and Maya to vibrant traditions seen in art, music, and cuisine.

tidbits.title: Diverse Landscapes
tidbits.description: The country offers diverse landscapes, including stunning beaches, mountains, deserts, and lush rainforests rich in biodiversity.

tidbits.title: Culinary Delights
tidbits.description: Mexican cuisine is celebrated globally for its flavors, with dishes like tacos, enchiladas, and mole showcasing the country's culinary heritage.
